name: Dog's Best Friend (JumboWumbo101)
description:
The game features humorous dialogue and a lighthearted story that leaves a lasting impact on players. This game encourages a bit of exploring and piques your curiosity to see what kind of gameplay sequences are in each day.

Phil is a pet owner who shares his home with his talking (and devilishly handsome) dog, Chewie. The two go through the struggles of living with each other all the while learning some life lessons. 

Through a number of short days, you'll need to decide how you would like to treat your pet dog. The trust meter will determine how much your dog trusts you as an owner. Depending on the status of your trust meter, a unique ending will be shown to the player. 

The choice is all yours...

//CONTROLS\\

[MOVE = AWSD OR ARROW KEYS]

[RUN = HOLD DOWN RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON]

[INTERACT = SPACEBAR]

[SELECT = LEFT MOUSE BUTTON]
